title: "Instability Phenomenon Discovered in AI Image Reconstruction"
excerpt: "However, there is a troubling weak spot emerging when it comes to using AI and deep learning for medical image reconstruction. On Monday, a new joint study led by the University of Cambridge and Simon Fraser University discovered an instability phenomenon when using artificial intelligence machine learning for image reconstructions that could lead to inaccurate medical diagnoses."
